Package io.micronaut.web.router

Interface FilterRoute

All Superinterfaces:
AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationSource, HttpFilterResolver.FilterEntry
public interface FilterRoute extends HttpFilterResolver.FilterEntry
A filter route is a route that matches an HttpFilter.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
